title: riot doesnt ban players if you think so congrats you got swindled
body:
Ive posted many of names to the boards riot support tickets all account sharing boosted (obviously) players and none of them ever in their lives actually get banned. The only person to actually look into shit and do anything is triggs and hes gone. Just funny that people say to report or whatever. Dont even try in ranked cuz it wont matter. You still get account sharing players that afk in your games anyways. So why even bother if the company doesnt?

and because this yasuo didnt say a word in his game he wont get banned at all. flopped sums different champs played was silver now 60% win rate feeding hmm. Goes 0-6 and afk's for over 10 min as well.

The only reason this game so shit is because this fucker can waste 4 other peoples times and be a jackass WHILE being allowed to get away with it. Oh and if I DARE say something negative to the kid he could report me and I have a higher chance of being banned rofl. What an absolute joke. This is why the games dying, everyone I know plays overwatch now.

replies.body: If people didn't get banned then there wouldn't be a ton of threads in PB&M of people complaining that they got banned.

> [{quoted}](name=Genuwhine36,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=i4QnZ4et,comment-id=,timestamp=2016-08-19T23:42:29.258+0000)
>
> Ive posted many of names to the boards riot support tickets all account sharing boosted (obviously) players

But did you report them? Riot does not use posts to the forums as any evidence against players as its against the forum rules to post that information here (naming and shaming). Support tickets only help in cases where you have screenshot evidence and the game wasn't completed to my knowledg (for example if someone queue dodges). If you report them then they are much more likely to be punished if they are actually doing it and other people are reporting them for it as well.
People get banned all the time. Have you been living under a rock?

> just funny that people say to report or whatever. Dont even try in ranked cuz it wont matter. You still get account sharing players that afk in your games anyways. 


Maybe he is not the most subtle or eloquent poster, but what he/she is saying is largely true.

It's infested nearly every single game now during certain parts of day. I hear and understand his frustration. What am I as a player supposed to do in the next year or longer that this lawsuit drags on, and what about all the other cheaters out there. 

As an individual player it's getting harder and harder to simply enjoy playing the game.
